data.title: Per-player shrouds
data.body:
We had a pull request for this before that kind of hung around for a long time with no merge. I've gone through and created a single commit that only contains our per-player shroud stuff and brings it up to date with 'bleed'. 

This pull request is in response to issue #2499.
- Each player has their own shroud and their visibility does not extend outside of the shroud. 
- Units and buildings can no longer target other units outside of their visibility. Buildings can still be targetted if they have been explored.
- GPS will provide visibility in the fog-of-war.
- Spies that infiltrate radar domes will gain their victim's exploration and reset it on all clients (if the victim does not have GPS)

data.title: bug: newest playtest crashes when loading replay match
data.body:
while loading a replay game in openra, the application unexpectedly quits to the desktop.

maybe it has to do something with the replay game itself: if it crashed e.g.

data.title: Zombie Aircrafts
data.body: Im not 100% sure what causes this bug...  but what happends is that a plane gets shot down (only seen it happend to yak tho) and at the sametime gets out of ammo (so it gets the command to return to base... which causes the plane to fly back and land on the airstrip while its dead... so it just sits there with no health bar and cant lift off or anything and just takes up a slot.. happend quiet alot of times and im surprised no one had reported it

data.title: d2k: add Tuck's Sietch remake
data.body:
by DraLUSAD from
http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&t=16009

data.title: RA hotkey config by @TiriliPiitPiit
data.body: This is TiriliPiitPiit-master20121019.+.HotkeyAddons4.-.ClassicMouseStyle merged onto bleed with a little cleanup. The unused *Building.cs tag traits have been removed and the building palette hotkeys are not hard-coded to RA buildings anymore, but user-configurable via the GUI, too.

data.title: Hotkey to teleport chronotank(s)
data.body: Ideally a hotkey that - among all selected units - recognizes all of the ChronoshiftDeploy: tagged units, and shows a preview of the chrono destination. Mouse clicking teleports them.

data.title: Merge per-player shroud from LookingGlass' fork
data.body: seen at https://github.com/Lookingglass/OpenRA/

data.title: make Volkov a true Cyborg
data.body:
- Added new Armor value: Cybernetic
- Use sounds/graphics from DE censored version
- Heals near repair pad (instead of hospital)
- Medic can't heal him
- Dogs can't eat him
- Tanks need two attempts to crush him
- +25% HP (now same factor as 4tnk:1tnk compared to e1)

data.title: Uncomfortable mouse handling with more than one screen
data.body:
Hi,

i have noticed that, when you have more than one screen, and move your ingame mouse pointer towards the edge of your game screen (e.g. when scrolling), the mouse isn't captured in the game, but i can push it onto the other screen.

This means that the game loses focus. The ingame mouse pointer is still at the edge of the game screen, and the map scrolls until it reaches its end. 

In the heat of the battle, this is quite uncomfortable. ;)

I have MacOS 10.8

data.title: Don't remap civilian buildings/fields in-game.
data.body: V16 field was affected most because it consists nearly only of remapped colors. This was already fixed in the editor, but apparently not in the game itself.

data.title: RA: add shadow to supply truck
data.body:
"In the original game it is barely noticable: the Supply Truck has no shadow. The Demolition Truck looks almost the same and it casts a shadow.

Shadow copied from the Demolition Truck."

from Arda 0.1 at http://www.stuffhost.de/files/redalert/manual/ArdaManual.html#supplytruckshadow

data.title: RA: Snow craters fix by MrFlibble
data.body: Small graphical patch fixing some snow craters and scorch marks compiled by @Nyerguds. Found it at http://nyerguds.arsaneus-design.com/cncstuff/0_files.html#ra_smudgefix

data.title: fixes #2481
data.body: Don't save maps in system paths using OpenRA.Editor.exe because UNIX needs root and shipped files should not be changed. Use $HOME/maps/$MOD instead.

data.title: Installation Failed - Unable to load DLL 'SDL.dll'
data.body:
tried all morning to install, cannot get past installer, tried many times with different versions from the website.

it gets to about 75% then stops installing and says
installation aborted

exception log below:
Exception of type `System.DllNotFoundException`: Unable to load DLL 'SDL.dll': The specified module could not be found. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)
TypeName=``
at Tao.Sdl.Sdl.__SDL_Init(Int32 flags)
at Tao.Sdl.Sdl.SDL_Init(Int32 flags)
at OpenRA.Renderer.SdlCommon.SdlGraphics.InitializeSdlGl(Size& size, WindowMode window, String[] requiredExtensions)

at OpenRA.Renderer.Glsl.DeviceFactory.Create(Size size, WindowMode windowMode)
at OpenRA.Graphics.Renderer.CreateDevice(Assembly rendererDll, Int32 width, Int32 height, WindowMode window)
at OpenRA.Graphics.Renderer.Initialize(WindowMode windowMode)
at OpenRA.Game.Initialize(Arguments args)
at OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
at OpenRA.Program.Main(String[] args)

I am running running win 7 64 bit.
i have deactivated anti virus and also if i search my computer i can also find the DLL it mentions so really stuck now...

please help

Mike

data.title: implementation of Auto-Map-Download
Objectives tab not visible at low resolutions
data.body: In the single player campaigns, the objectives tab is not visible at low resolutions, such as 800 x 600. It's probably there, but hidden behind the other buttons of the user interface.

data.title: Do not capture mouse while keyboard capturing in ingame chat
huge CPU usage with very slow gameplay (laggs) in mission 3 if packed by walls
data.body:
I did try to pack my all base/building by walls in mission 3 and got very slow gameplay,
looks like AI can not to find target and recalculation of this without sleep(), AI is not attack.. and CPU 100% with laggs.
So I think add some sleep() in loop of recalculating shuld solve the problem....

data.title: Update AI
data.body: This AI work with all mods. In it, I tried to implement support for most of the features (including aviation and support power). Includes third party FuzzyLogicLibrary from Dmitry Kaluzhny.

data.title: Update mods/cnc/music.yaml
data.body: 'I Am' was the name of the band that made this song (with Mr. Klepacki on drums), the track is actually called Destructible Times. Also brought titles of Warfare/Full Stop as well as Heavy Gear/Demolition in line with other double-named tracks.

data.title: Map editor: (Linux) Wont save...

TL;DR im pretty sure its because you're not allowed to save to that directory without the right permissions... i would recommend just changing the path to where the files get saved to home/.openra or something like that... once tried making a map and i spended 4 hours on it... and then it didnt get saved... yeay...

data.title: Crash when launching a modified/new mod for no reason!
Crash due to desync in 20121104
data.body:
Lets summarize desyncs from the yesterday's tournament:

Desync from diff between Unksi's and ihptru's syncreports:
1085    -        584 heli donb Health (109)
1085    +        584 heli donb Health (96)
http://pastebin.com/diff.php?i=NhkndXxi

Desync from diff between Scott and hamb syncreports:
569 -        425 3tnk Ripley Health (359)
569 +        425 3tnk Ripley Health (348)
http://pastebin.com/diff.php?i=smDxxa8x
